# Sanvia Website Project

## Project Complete âœ…

This workspace contains a static website for Sanvia.co, the IP holding company for EQ12 platform antimicrobial technology. The website replicates the design and structure of www.dyna.co as requested.

### Project Structure
- `index.html` - Main website file
- `css/style.css` - Responsive styling
- `js/script.js` - Interactive functionality  
- `assets/` - Image placeholders (replace with actual Sanvia assets)
- `README.md` - Deployment and customization guide

### Completed Tasks
- [x] Project scaffolding and file structure
- [x] Responsive HTML/CSS based on Dyna.co template
- [x] Content adapted for Sanvia/EQ12 antimicrobial technology
- [x] JavaScript functionality for interactivity
- [x] Documentation and deployment instructions
- [x] Local testing server setup

### Next Steps for Deployment
1. Replace placeholder images with actual Sanvia branding
2. Review and refine content for accuracy
3. Deploy to www.sanvia.co via GoDaddy hosting or preferred platform
4. Set up form processing for lead generation
5. Add analytics and tracking

The website is ready for customization and deployment to your domain.
